welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Bolton, Canada! Get ready to experience breathtaking nature, delicious local cuisine, and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our beautiful city has to offer."

restaurants.name: Sushi Date

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Lester B. Pearson International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The second largest terminal at Lester B. Pearson International Airport, primarily serving international flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Buttonville Municipal Airport is a modern facility with a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Buttonville Municipal Airport offers VIP services for private jet owners and their guests.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Terminal for private and charter flights

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport
